name: Thalia Swiftwind
stats: Str 10, Dex 18, Con 12, Int 14, Wis 16, Cha 10
backstory: Thalia was born in a small elven village hidden deep in the forest. She was trained in archery from a young age and is known for her deadly accuracy with a bow. She now travels the world, seeking out rare creatures to study and protect.
equipment:
Leather armor, longbow, arrows, hunting knife
Weapon: Longbow

name: Grok Stonefist
stats: Str 18, Dex 12, Con 16, Int 8, Wis 10, Cha 10
backstory: Grok grew up in a tribe of fierce warriors, learning to fight from a young age. His rage knows no bounds in battle, and he is feared by enemies for his brutal strength. He now roams the land in search of worthy opponents to challenge.
equipment:
Chainmail armor, greataxe, javelins
Weapon: Greataxe

name: Seraphina Moonshadow
stats: Str 10, Dex 14, Con 12, Int 16, Wis 10, Cha 18
backstory: Seraphina was born with the gift of magic, her tiefling heritage giving her a natural affinity for fire spells. She is a skilled sorcerer, using her powers to protect the innocent and seek out knowledge of the arcane.
equipment:
Robes, arcane focus, spellbook
Weapon: Firebolt spell

name: Kaelin Frostbeard
stats: Str 16, Dex 12, Con 18, Int 10, Wis 10, Cha 8
backstory: Kaelin is a battle-hardened dwarf warrior, known for his unbreakable resolve and unwavering loyalty. He fights to protect his mountain home and uphold the honor of his clan, always ready to stand against any threat.
equipment:
Plate armor, warhammer, shield
Weapon: Warhammer

name: Ember Darkwood
stats: Str 12, Dex 18, Con 14, Int 14, Wis 10, Cha 16
backstory: Ember is a skilled thief and master of stealth, using her agility and cunning to navigate the criminal underworld. She operates in the shadows, taking on dangerous jobs for the right price and always planning her next heist.
equipment:
Studded leather armor, daggers, thieves' tools
Weapon: Dual daggers

name: Alistair Stormborn
stats: Str 18, Dex 12, Con 16, Int 10, Wis 16, Cha 14
backstory: Alistair is a noble knight sworn to protect the innocent and uphold the laws of justice. He wields the power of divine magic, his faith unwavering in the face of evil. He seeks to bring peace and order to a chaotic world.
equipment:
Full plate armor, shield, longsword, holy symbol
Weapon: Longsword

name: Lysandra Silverleaf
stats: Str 8, Dex 14, Con 12, Int 18, Wis 16, Cha 10
backstory: Lysandra is a brilliant gnome wizard, known for her endless curiosity and thirst for knowledge. She travels the world in search of ancient secrets and hidden magical artifacts, using her spells to unravel mysteries and uncover the truth.
equipment:
Robes, spellbook, arcane focus
Weapon: Fireball spell

name: Draven Blackthorn
stats: Str 10, Dex 16, Con 12, Int 14, Wis 10, Cha 18
backstory: Draven made a pact with a powerful fiend in exchange for dark magic, his soul bound to his otherworldly patron. He harnesses eldritch energy to unleash devastating spells upon his enemies, always mindful of the consequences of his dark bargain.
equipment:
Leather armor, eldritch blast, arcane focus
Weapon: Eldritch blast

name: Aurora Starlight
stats: Str 12, Dex 14, Con 16, Int 10, Wis 18, Cha 16
backstory: Aurora is a blessed cleric of the divine, chosen by the gods to bring healing and light to those in need. She spreads faith and compassion wherever she goes, using her powers to fight evil and uphold the teachings of her celestial patrons.
equipment:
Chainmail armor, mace, holy symbol
Weapon: Mace

name: Volk Ironfist
stats: Str 16, Dex 14, Con 12, Int 10, Wis 18, Cha 10
backstory: Volk is a disciplined orc monk, trained in the ways of martial arts and self-control. He seeks inner peace and enlightenment through physical and mental mastery, using his skills to defend the innocent and uphold justice in a world plagued by chaos.
equipment:
Robes, quarterstaff, monk's tools
Weapon: Quarterstaff

name: Thalia Swiftwind
stats: STR 12, DEX 18, CON 14, INT 10, WIS 16, CHA 13
backstory: Thalia hails from a tribe of woodland elves who have lived in harmony with nature for centuries. She was trained from a young age to be a skilled archer and tracker, using her abilities to protect her people from threats in the forest.
equipment:
Leather armor, longbow, quiver of arrows, dagger, backpack
   Weapon: Longbow
   Backstory: Thalia hails from a tribe of woodland elves who have lived in harmony with nature for centuries. She was trained from a young age to be a skilled archer and tracker, using her abilities to protect her people from threats in the forest.

name: Gromak Stonefist
stats: STR 18, DEX 14, CON 16, INT 8, WIS 12, CHA 10
backstory: Gromak comes from a long line of proud dwarf warriors, known for their strength and ferocity in battle. He honed his skills in combat through years of training and has a reputation for never backing down from a fight.
equipment:
Chainmail armor, greataxe, javelins, potion of healing, backpack
   Weapon: Greataxe
   Backstory: Gromak comes from a long line of proud dwarf warriors, known for their strength and ferocity in battle. He honed his skills in combat through years of training and has a reputation for never backing down from a fight.

name: Isadora Nightshade
stats: STR 10, DEX 14, CON 12, INT 16, WIS 10, CHA 18
backstory: Isadora made a pact with a powerful fiend in exchange for dark powers, using her newfound abilities to seek vengeance on those who wronged her in the past. She is mysterious and cunning, often manipulating situations to her advantage.

Robes, arcane focus, spellbook, dagger, potion of invisibility
   Weapon: Eldritch blast
   Backstory: Isadora made a pact with a powerful fiend in exchange for dark powers, using her newfound abilities to seek vengeance on those who wronged her in the past. She is mysterious and cunning, often manipulating situations to her advantage.

name: Kaelen Fireheart
stats: STR 14, DEX 12, CON 16, INT 10, WIS 10, CHA 18
backstory: Kaelen discovered his innate magical abilities at a young age, harnessing the power of fire to protect his clan from enemies. He is passionate and quick-tempered, often using his fiery nature to intimidate foes.
equipment:
Robes, arcane focus, spell components, dagger, scroll of fireball
   Weapon: Firebolt
   Backstory: Kaelen discovered his innate magical abilities at a young age, harnessing the power of fire to protect his clan from enemies. He is passionate and quick-tempered, often using his fiery nature to intimidate foes.

name: Sariel Silverwing
stats: STR 16, DEX 12, CON 14, INT 10, WIS 16, CHA 18
backstory: Sariel is a chosen champion of the gods, sworn to uphold justice and righteousness in the world. She radiates an aura of divine light, inspiring allies and striking fear into the hearts of evildoers with her holy prowess.

Plate armor, shield, longsword, holy symbol, potion of healing
   Weapon: Longsword
   Backstory: Sariel is a chosen champion of the gods, sworn to uphold justice and righteousness in the world. She radiates an aura of divine light, inspiring allies and striking fear into the hearts of evildoers with her holy prowess.

name: Draxus Bloodthorn
stats: STR 18, DEX 14, CON 16, INT 10, WIS 12, CHA 10
backstory: Draxus grew up as an outcast in orcish society, constantly battling to prove his worth through brute strength and determination. He is fiercely loyal to his friends and will stop at nothing to protect them in combat.
equipment:
Half plate armor, battleaxe, throwing axes, potion of strength, backpack
   Weapon: Battleaxe
   Backstory: Draxus grew up as an outcast in orcish society, constantly battling to prove his worth through brute strength and determination. He is fiercely loyal to his friends and will stop at nothing to protect them in combat.

stats: STR 12, DEX 16, CON 14, INT 14, WIS 10, CHA 18
backstory: Elara is a talented musician and storyteller, using her charms and wit to captivate audiences wherever she goes. She travels the land seeking inspiration for her next ballad, always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need.

   Backstory: Elara is a talented musician and storyteller, using her charms and wit to captivate audiences wherever she goes. She travels the land seeking inspiration for her next ballad, always ready to lend a helping hand to those in need.

name: Ragnor Blackstone
stats: STR 16, DEX 18, CON 14, INT 10, WIS 16, CHA 12
backstory: Ragnor was raised in a monastery high in the mountains, where he learned the ways of combat and meditation from the monks. He is disciplined and focused, using his martial arts skills to bring balance to the world around him.

   Backstory: Ragnor was raised in a monastery high in the mountains, where he learned the ways of combat and meditation from the monks. He is disciplined and focused, using his martial arts skills to bring balance to the world around him.

name: Nyx Shadowbane
stats: STR 12, DEX 18, CON 14, INT 16, WIS 10, CHA 12
backstory: Nyx is a master of stealth and deception, able to slip in and out of the shadows with ease. She has a shady past as a professional thief and assassin, using her skills to survive in a world filled with danger.

   Weapon: Shortsword
   Backstory: Nyx is a master of stealth and deception, able to slip in and out of the shadows with ease. She has a shady past as a professional thief and assassin, using her skills to survive in a world filled with danger.

stats: STR 10, DEX 16, CON 14, INT 12, WIS 18, CHA 12
backstory: Aelar is a protector of the natural world, using his powers to commune with animals and plants to maintain balance in the forests. He is gentle and kind-hearted, always seeking harmony in the world around him.

name: Thalia Silvermoon
backstory: Thalia was raised by a group of thieves who instilled in her a love for adventure and a talent for deception. She now roams the land taking what she wants without anyone ever knowing she was there.
equipment:
Leather armor, cloak of invisibility, thieves' tools
Weapon: Dagger
